roleset.name: natural disaster: volcanic mud flow
roleset.note: LAHAR-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to avalanche, landslide, mudslide, rockslide. (from lahar.01-n)

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: lahar-n
example.text: Can the Minister confirm that the department's report states that a 1,000,000-tonne lahar dropping from a height of 8,000 feet is likely sometime in the next 3 years
example.arg: dropping from a height of 8,000 feet

example.name: lahar-n
example.text: In 2002, a lahar from the African Mount Nyiragongo volcanic eruption killed at least 75 people.
example.arg: from the African Mount Nyiragongo volcanic eruption
